Fancy Restaurants

  2. La Dolce Vita - Italian Cuisine
  3. The Royal Saffron - Indian Cuisine
  4. Sakura Garden - Japanese Cuisine (Sushi and Teppanyaki)

  7. El Cielo Azul - Spanish Cuisine
  8. The Silk Road - Middle Eastern Cuisine
  9. The Emerald Lotus - Thai Cuisine
  10. The Steakhouse Royale - Classic American Steakhouse
  11. The Imperial Dragon - Chinese Cuisine
  12. Bistecca d'Oro - Italian Steakhouse
  13. The Golden Tandoor - Fine Indian Grill
  14. Le Petit Château - Modern French Cuisine
  15. La Perla del Mar - Seafood and Latin Fusion
  16. The Grand Spice Bazaar - Exotic Spices and Global Flavors
  17. Ristorante di Mare - Coastal Italian Cuisine
  18. The Orient Express - Asian Fusion
  19. El Jardín Místico - Latin American Cuisine
